thread.title: Spain requires VW subsidiary SEAT to return clean subsidies
thread.title_full: Spain requires VW subsidiary SEAT to return clean subsidies

title: Spain requires VW subsidiary SEAT to return clean subsidies
text: Spain requires VW subsidiary SEAT to return clean subsidies Saturday, 26 September 2015 (1 minute ago) Jose Manuel Soria, the minister of industry, energy and tourism, said he expected SEAT to tell his ministry how many vehicles it had produced and sold containing software that cheats on diesel engine emissions tests. Volkswagen has admitted installing defeat devices on diesel engines that switch on pollution controls when the cars are being tested but turn them off when the cars are back on the road.
